name: Stag Knight

skills.name: Spot Quarry
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit has a 30% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns.

effects.notes: Hits twice, 4 ATK multiplier per hit (total 8 ATK if both hit). Effectively one of highest damage A1 skills in game.
30% base chance (50% booked). Each hit independent chance. Crucial for turn meter control (Spider, Fire Knight, Iron Twins).

skills.book_value: HIGH PRIORITY - Damage +25% total (5+5+10%), Debuff chance +20% (5+5+10% = 50% final). Essential for Fire Knight shield break and Spider/Iron Twins control.
skills.notes: Pairs with HP Burn teams (Spider). Does NOT place Decrease Speed on Clan Boss (immune). Passive triggers on resist. Base 30% → 50% booked.

skills.name: Huntmaster
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Has a 70% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff and a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns.

effects.notes: AOE attack with 3.5 ATK multiplier. Lower multiplier than A1 but critical debuff delivery mechanism.
70% base chance (90% booked). Essential for amplifying team damage. Pairs with nukers (Seer, Royal Guard, Coldheart).
70% base chance (90% booked). Critical survivability buff. Reduces incoming damage by 50%. Clan Boss essential.

skills.book_value: HIGHEST PRIORITY - Damage +10%, Debuff chance +20% (5+10+10% = 90% final), Cooldown -1 turn. Book this first for 100% uptime (3-turn CD, 2-turn duration with Sniper mastery).
skills.notes: CORE ABILITY. Speed-tune to go first before nukers. Clan Boss: 100% uptime on Decrease ATK critical for survival past 5min mark. Dungeons: Enables Savage set nukers (Royal Guard, Seer, Coldheart). Passive triggers if debuffs resisted.

skills.name: Lead the Pack
skills.description: Places a 50% [Increase ACC] buff on an ally for 1 turn each time the ally has a debuff resisted by an enemy.

effects.notes: Triggers when ANY ally debuff is RESISTED (not blocked by Block Debuffs). Helps debuffers land abilities in high-RES content (Doom Tower, Iron Twins). Does NOT trigger on self.

skills.book_value: N/A - Passive skill, cannot be booked.
skills.notes: Exceptional passive for late-game content (Agreth Nether Spider HP Burn, Iron Twins Decrease SPD spam). Pairs with debuff-heavy teams (Geomancer HP Burn, Poison explosion). Only triggers on RESIST, not Block Debuffs. Self-synergy: If A1/A2 resisted, boosts ally ACC for next turn.

forms.comments: Epic Spirit Support, Banner Lords. Battle Pass Gold exclusive (Feb 2020). 'Legendary in disguise' - community consensus. One of best Epic champions in game.

recommended_gear: Lifesteal + Speed (CB/Dungeons) - SPD/ACC primary, Warmaster sustain
Perception + Speed (High ACC) - Iron Twins, DT Hard

clan_boss: OFFENSE: Warmaster. SUPPORT: Pinpoint Accuracy, Master Hexer, Sniper (90%→100% debuff). Remove Arcane Celerity for Counter teams.
dungeons: OFFENSE: Warmaster. SUPPORT: Pinpoint Accuracy, Arcane Celerity, Master Hexer, Sniper.
arena: OFFENSE: Warmaster. SUPPORT: Pinpoint Accuracy, Master Hexer, Sniper.
doom_tower: Same as dungeons. Sniper essential for high-RES bosses.
general: ALWAYS: Warmaster (multi-hit A1), Sniper (100% debuff), Master Hexer (extend duration).

blessings: Phantom Touch (Damage) - Extra hit chance on A1

ai_quirks.ai_issue_description: Ice Golem: Will NOT use A2 while minions alive. Only uses A2 after minions killed. Requires manual play.

cheese_strategy.cheese_mechanic_info: Not cheese champion. Enables cheese for others (Decrease DEF for Seer, Savage nukers).

mechanics_advisory: LEGENDARY IN DISGUISE - S-tier Epic. Core debuffer all content. Speed-tune FIRST before nukers. CB: 100% uptime Decrease ATK essential (book A2, use Sniper). Dungeons: Pairs with MAX HP dealers (Seer, Royal Guard, Coldheart). Spider: A1 Decrease SPD + HP Burn teams. Iron Twins: Passive ACC boost. Battle Pass Gold exclusive (Feb 2020).
